segments.text: There are something wrong with my computer .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The computer doesn't work when I push the power cotton .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , do you use your computer often ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I don't know why it doesn't work this time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't worry . Have you got receipt with you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We'll go to your house and repair it on Tuesday.Ok ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , I'll expected you around 2 o'clock ?
segments.speaker: S1
